sense.gloss: paid dating (esp. with an underage girl; oft. involving selling of sex), compensated dating

sdata.j: ↑援助↑↓|えんじょ↓↑交際↑↓こうさい|↓をほのめかすネット↑掲示板↑↓けいじばん↓に↑書↑↓か↓き↑込↑↓こ↓んだ↑女子高↑↓じょしこう↓↑生↑↓せい↓が↑検挙↑↓けんきょ↓されました。
sdata.e: A high school girl posting on a web forum hinting at underaged prostitution has been arrested.
